name: TwentyAt
tag_list: 20, 20-, twenty, twenty-at, twentyat, text, message, photos, pictures, chat, post
overview:
TwentyAt is simply the fastest & easiest way to interact and keep the conversation going with your 20 closest friends and family.

We started 20@ because we needed a better (more private & less clunky) way to stay in touch with the most important people in our life.

For iPhone and iPad…and if your battery dies, just go to www.TwentyAt.com, where you can continue to send/ receive messages using our webApp - everything stays sync’ed automatically with your mobile 20@.

  • FREE GROUP MESSAGING (Int’l) - Send photos, locations and ETA (Estimated Time of Arrival). Chat and collaborate with multiple people at once through the easiest group messaging available. NO text costs.

  • FRIENDS MAP - See your 20 on a map with real-time location sharing. Toggle location sharing on/off anytime with one easy press (RED light means OFF, GREEN light means ON)!

  • PRIVATE COMMENTS on Facebook STREAM - View your Facebook activity in the streams tab. Except on 20@ it’s even better! You can respond with a private comment to each status/post, instead of to the entire Facebook viewers, so only your recipient sees it!

  • LOVE YOUR 20 - Faces are the first thing you see on the app, and everything else follows intuitively. So easy to use, everyone already knows how to use it!

Forget the noise & clutter of the old social networks, and interact more with the people that really matter. 20@ lets you communicate freely without concerns about over-sharing.
